ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(ISBLANK(Alternate_Contact_Number__c)), OR( LEN(TEXT(Alternate_Contact_Number__c)) <> 10, NOT(REGEX(TEXT(Alternate_Contact_Number__c), "[0-9]+")), REGEX(TEXT(Alternate_Contact_Number__c), "(.)\\1{9}"), LEFT(TEXT(Alternate_Contact_Number__c), 5) = "12345" ) )
